alert.note: Alert for Milwaukee; Racine; Waukesha (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN MILWAUKEE... NORTHEASTERN RACINE AND SOUTHEASTERN WAUKESHA COUNTIES THROUGH 500 PM CDT... At 430 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Franklin, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Milwaukee, New Berlin, Greenfield, Oak Creek, Muskego, South Milwaukee, Cudahy, Greendale, St. Francis, Hales Corners, Franklin, Wind Lake, Raymond, Big Bend, and Caledonia. This includes the following highways... Interstate 43 between mile markers 60 and 61. Interstate 41/43/894 between mile markers 5 and 9. Interstate 43/94 between mile markers 313 and 316. Interstate 41/94 between mile markers 317 and 328. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
